page.title: 13SKELMERSDALE - HOUSING
page.content: All the housing in the New Town has been built since about 1960 and the majority is Local Authority owned. There are a number of estates each with their own particular identity and style but the feature common to all is the centralised motor access and the pedestrianised areas surrounding the housing developments. Considerable efforts are currently being made to improve and modernise a number of these properties and a number of Sheltered properties for the elderly have been built in recent years. Skelmersdale has a mainly young population but this is changing gradually as the town matures.
